div.p: Names and affiliations of applicants (* indicates experimentalists): Pedro MATIAS (ITQB-UNL) * Carlos CUNHA (CQFB-UNL) * João DIAS (CQFB-UNL) * Report: Adenylate kinase from Desulfovibrio gigas (native):

A data set was collected to 2.05 Å resolution. Overall statistics: R-merge = 11 %, completeness = 90.8%, I/σ(I) = 12.0 , redundancy = 4.7. Highest resolution shell statistics (2.12 to 2.05 Å): R-merge = 32 %, completeness = 79.8%, I/σ (I) = 3.9, redundancy = 3.4. The solution of the structure is being tried by molecular replacement.

div.head: Cytochrome c Peroxidase from Pseudomonas nautica (native):
div.p: A data set was collected to 2.82 Å resolution. Overall statistics: R-merge = 11.5 %, completeness = 100.0 %, I/σ(I) = 17.4, redundancy = 13. Highest resolution shell statistics (2.96 to 2.82 Å): R-merge = 30.7 %, completeness = 100.0 %, I/σ(I) = 11.4, redundancy = 13. The structure was solved by the molecular replacement method and is being refined with CNS. Current R-factor is 20.67 % and R-free is 21.65 %.
Periplasmic Nitrate Reductase from Desulfovibrio desulfuricans ATCC 27774 (native) co-crystallised with cyanide: A data set was collected to 1.80 Å resolution.
